gw.api.assignment

Class CCAssignmentPopup

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.assignment.AssignmentPopup
      • gw.api.assignment.CCAssignmentPopup
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ActivityAssignmentPopup, ClaimAssignmentPopup, ExposureAssignmentPopup, MatterAssignmentPopup, ServiceRequestAssignmentPopup, SubrogationAssignmentPopup

    public class CCAssignmentPopup
extends AssignmentPopup
    ClaimCenter extension to the basic AssignmentPopup, used to support the assignment popup in ClaimCenter. The only difference from the generic AssignmentPopup is that this one keeps track of the current claim.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class gw.api.assignment.AssignmentPopup

    • Constructor Detail

      • CCAssignmentPopup

        public CCAssignmentPopup(IEntityType assignableType,
                         Assignable[] assignables,
                         SuggestedAssigneeBuilder suggestedAssigneeBuilder)
        Creates a new assignment popup for the given assignables of the given assignable type. Uses the provided suggestedAssigneeBuilder to generate an initial list of likely assignees. Sets the current claim to null
        Parameters:
        assignableType - the type of the assignable entities to be assigned
        assignables - the entities to be assigned
        suggestedAssigneeBuilder - builder that returns a list of likely assignees to be suggested to the user. The user will be able to search for other assignees if the one they want is not in this suggested list.

      • CCAssignmentPopup

        public CCAssignmentPopup(IEntityType assignableType,
                         CCAssignable[] assignables)
        Creates a new assignment popup for the given CC assignables of the given assignable type. Constructs a generic suggested assignee builder for the given type to populate the drop down list in the popup.
        Parameters:
        assignableType - the type of the assignable entities to be assigned
        assignables - the entities to be assigned

    • Method Detail

      • getClaim

        public Claim getClaim()
        The current claim associated with this popup, or null.
        Returns:
        the claim, or null

      • setClaim

        public void setClaim(Claim claim)
        Set the current claim associated with this popup.
        Parameters:
        claim - the current claim

      • getUnifiedClaim

        protected Claim getUnifiedClaim(IEntityType assignableType,
                                CCAssignable[] assignables)
        Utility that looks for a "Claim" property on the given assignable type. If this property is present and it returns the same claim for all the assignables in the array, then that claim is returned. If the array is empty, the property is not present or the assignables have different claims, returns null
        Parameters:
        assignableType - the type of the assignables
        assignables - the assignables
        Returns:
        a claim, or null
